resources.string: MiniMobileDeviceLab
Hello world!
Settings
Log out

Welcome to Your Device Lab\n\nThere are 2 components to your device lab: this app, which should be installed on all Android devices you want to include in your lab, and a google app engine app. Go to https://github.com/GoogleChrome/MiniMobileDeviceLab to download the google app engine code and deploy it.
GAE app id
GAE app number
Cancel
Set
Tap to verify your GAE project ID
Verifying your GAE project ID
GAE Project ID verified, you may now log in. The GAE Number will be verified upon logging in.
GAE ID verification failed, please check that you have deployed your GAE app properly and entered the correct Project ID. Tap to retry.
Tap to set your GAE app id
Tap to set your GAE app number
The Project ID of your GAE app
The Project Number of your GAE app
We are adding your device to your lab...
Sorry, we couldn\'t add your device to your lab, due to
error logging you in with Google +
error registering for pushed notifications. Please, verify the project number you have entered
error communicating with your GAE app
Once you\'ve deployed your GAE app and we have verified your setup is correct, you will be able to login to add this device to your lab.
You can now login to add this device to your lab.
Once you provide the project number for your GAE, you will be able to login to add this device to your lab.

Device Lab

There isn't much you can do with this...

But if you send a URL from your device lab site, we'll be ready and waiting to handle it for you
We are removing your device from your lab...
Sorry, we couldn\'t delete your device from your lab, it seems that the user you have used to log into Google + doesn\'t own the device in the lab - contact the device lab administrator
Sorry, we couldn\'t delete your device from your lab, due to error communicating with your GAE app
